post.author: 이재연
post.content:
Jaeyeon, Lee
+82-11-9065-0727, jaeyeon46@gmail.com

[OBJECTIVE]
An experienced WiMAX Software Engineer seeking a challenging position where I may contribute and further expand on strong skills and experience.


[PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE]
WiMAX Software Engineer, 2004 - Present
- Five years experience in developing WiMAX 802.16d/16e Base Station MAC layer
- WiMAX Base Station Scheduler implementation with Montavista linux on x86 and PPC85xx
- Mobile WiMAX Base Station Scheduler optimization with TI DSP/BIOS
- WiMAX system design, implementation and testing ACR - (via Ethernet) - BS - (via air channel) - MS
- Experienced in Hardware interface part between MAC and PHY layer
- Strong debugging and interface test skill with TI DSP code composer studio
- Strong knowledge of IEEE 802.16d/16e standard
- Working knowledge of software/hardware partitioning
- Strong “C” Coding experience in real time embedded systems
- Strong debugging skill with Linux and Windows development environment
- Experienced in using emulators, protocol simulators and various analysis / debug tools
post.title: [구직] Embedded Software Engineer - 5 years
